title.en: Prayer to Gyarong Khandro Dechen Wangmo

text.en: Great ḍākinī, you are the embodiment of the compassion and blessings
text.en-trans: yeshe khandro men da rawa dang
ying yum dechen yeshe tsogyal sok

text.en: The space-consort of great bliss, Yeshe Tsogyal, and the rest—
text.en-trans: jinlab tukjé rang zuk khandro ché

text.en: Dharmacandra,1'Moon of Dharma', at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: dharma tsandré zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings so that I may purify all my negative karma, harmful actions and obscurations,
text.en-trans: lé ngen dikdrib dakpar jingyi lob

text.en: And cleanse all impairments and breakages of samaya, violations, faults and downfalls!
Wisdom ḍākinī, may your blessings fill my very being,
text.en-trans: yeshe khandro jinlab dak la zhuk

text.en: So that experience, realization and the power of rigpa develop boundlessly,
text.en-trans: nyamtok rigpé tsal kha chokmé gyé

text.en: And all sickness, evil influences, sorcery and witchcraft are dispelled!
Dechen Wangmo, always hold me in your care,
text.en-trans: dechen wang mö taktu jezung zhing

text.en: Until ultimately, in the city of Lotus Light,
text.en-trans: tartuk pema ö kyi drongkhyer du

text.en: We become inseparable in the enlightened mind of secret wisdom!
text.en-trans: sangwa yeshe tuk dang yermé shok
